ygData.msgSnippet: ... If you mean the actual pyramids (they look like Aztec pyramids) that you find everywhere, they re undead generators (like the Undead Runes but with a
ygData.messageBody:
>What are the small pyramid shapes spread out across Norrath called >(not
>the road markers)? Has anyone seen these and know what they are >used for?
>
>Thanks in advance,
>
>Chris aka Thunderheart
>Level 19
>Wood-Elf
>Druid
>Innoruuk server

If you mean the actual pyramids (they look like Aztec pyramids) that you
find everywhere, they're undead generators (like the Undead Runes but with a
slower regen rate).
